title: Comment from Anonymous Citizen and patriot

analysis.key_quote: The current rule targets many non-policy positions simply to allow the administration to fire anyone not deemed loyal enough--this is politicization of the federal civil service--something that makes the government less efficient.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the potential negative impact on efficiency and hiring qualified candidates, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process.
